column4: Has anyone been able to install 9.04 64bit on a macbookpro3,1?
Where can i get macbookpro help?
jamieleshaw... i am in the same boat as you
join #macbookpro
lol
anyone have any problems installing 64bit other than me?
yes
What are you seeing again?  I had some issues with the alternate install.
I get to the install menu and the only selection i can make is to boot from main disk
Do you have an IDE CD Rom?
this is in a laptop. macbookpro3,1.. prettysure it is sata
are you there?
yeah
why does it matter if my cd rom drive is connected ide or sata?
Might be fixed now, but for 8.04 I had to buy a SATA cd rom.  The ide controller on my motherboard wasn't supported by the installer.
well.. it is internal on mac hardware.. i am pretty sure it is sata.. but would an external usb work?
external might work.  Worth a shot if you have one available.
i am on the machine right now with the 32bit version.. are the installers that different?
I'm not sure.  I have to use the alternate installer since I have a software RAID 5.
i will download the alternate installer and try that... cuz i know my laptop support 64bit... thanks for your help
good luck
